name: .SUP File Extension
summary: Learn about .SUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Subtitle bitmap image extracted from a DVD or Blu-ray movie; contains subtitle text graphics that are displayed during movie playback; can be used for adding DVD subtitles to movies with authoring programs such as IfoEdit.

content: SUP files can be converted to plain text using OCR (Optical Character Recognition) programs such as SupRip.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
